ResearchProjectDef.label: Comms console
ResearchProjectDef.description: Communicate with other factions, trade remotely with passing orbital traders, and open your colony to the grander world.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Game-of-Ur board
ResearchProjectDef.description: Set up an exciting yet infuriating board game can be played by one or two people. It trains intellectual skills.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hoopstone ring
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a simple ancient game played with stones and a large ring in the ground. Players try to toss stones through the ring from a distance. It's relaxing, and trains shooting skills.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Billiards table
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a soft-topped bounded table for playing a variety of billiards-type games. It trains shooting ability.
